website_summaries.verdict: Holding up to 66 lbs., this grocery and shopping cart is heavy-duty yet lightweight, swiveling in any direction needed.
pros: Only assembly is attaching two larger wheels, which doesn't require tools
Folds up to store, and is compact enough for even smaller car trunks
Users with bad backs have called this a lifesaver, thanks to its ease of use
They also love the cushioned grip
cons: Doesn't go up and down stairs as easily as some other models
Wheels may also get stuck in rough terrain with a heavy load

website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight collapsible cart is built to last and won't break your budget.
pros: Designed to fit a variety of items up to 66 pounds
Includes swivel wheels in the front and snap-on wheels in the back for unparalleled maneuverability
Boasts a long, soft handle that ensures you can seamlessly push the cart anywhere you need to go
cons: Front wheels may be difficult to pivot at times
Less than ideal when used on bumpy surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Service
customer_reviews.text: Incredible Service! I purchased this cart for my 80 year old mother and she loved it! However, she hit something with the back wheel and it broke. I contacted Wellmax directly to see about a replacement wheel. They apologized and sent my mom a new cart which she received 5 days after I contacted Wellmax. My mom was thrilled and so was I. It works perfectly for her when she needs to get groceries and other items from her car to her apartment. Thank you Wellmax!
customer_reviews.author: R Harrigan

customer_reviews.title: I could not be happier!
customer_reviews.text: I am 81 years old. Getting groceries is taxing. This cart has transformed my experience. I load out of the trunk into the cart, wheel it to refrigerator to put away cold items, and to cabinets to unload those items, and to the bedroom to unload toiletries/paper products, etc. It is sturdy, works beautifully, and collapses to a small space. I could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Bleewzg

customer_reviews.title: Superb Cart!
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, I’m not a girl that can put together things very easily, the ease of popping on the back wheels and putting up the bar was all done by me in less than 5 minutes. As far as the cart pushing and pulling front and back it’s heavy duty. It folds up quickly as well and isn’t too heavy. I would suggest this cart for anyone who needs to haul items to and from their car, to their office, home or if you live in a big space. I didn’t buy a liner yet but as it stands it’s been put to good use for my groceries and shopping items.
customer_reviews.author: Hourglass Fashionista

customer_reviews.title: Put my house on the market and it sold so ...
customer_reviews.text: Put my house on the market and it sold so quickly I had to find a temporary living situation. Moved into an apartment complex on the 3rd floor and needed a way to get groceries into the place without making 3 trips to the car. This cart has been a lifesaver for my back and shoulders. Seems to be a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Pickle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy to Put on Back Wheels
customer_reviews.text: SUPER easy to put together. It comes assembled except for the two large wheels. VERY easy to put those on so don't worry about needing help or not being able to do it. I'm a 63 year old female so if I can do it, you can do it. Love the swivel wheels and the cushy grip. I love the collapsible capability as I can put it into the back of my SUV. Sure helps with making one trip with my groceries from my car to apartment. Very lightweight and easy to maneuver. High quality materials used. I've had carts before and this one is the best I've used.
customer_reviews.author: MacKen

customer_reviews.title: A real back and knee saver. Groceries, luggage, etc. and it folds up. I use it constantly.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for someone, such as myself, with a bad knee or back. I use it to take my luggage into a hotel, to go grocery shopping, or to go to the farmers' market. I also use it to carry groceries into my house and all the way into the kitchen. It folds up so it fits into the back of my small car (Prius), and it is light enough I can easily lift it in and out of the car. I love it. It needs very little assembly.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cook

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE of this product if you have to use on uneven sidewalks.
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE of this product. The little wheels on the front are treacherous. If you have to use this on uneven sidewalks, the only way to do it safely is to pull it behind you, using only the back wheels, as you walk. Otherwise, any bumps in the sidewalk will cause it to stop short and you could very well fly over it and hit the sidewalk. That's what happened to me. Also, it's not made for tall people--the pull bar is too low and quite uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: KMB

customer_reviews.title: Defectively assembled and cannot use
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived unusable. The large back wheels and the axle attaching them ship disconnected from the rest of the cart. The axle fit easily in one bearing on the cart, but did not fit in the other bearing (see photo). It seems likely that whoever assembled it put in the wrong bearing: one for a small wheel/axle instead of one for the large wheel/axle. The bearing is attached to the cart in such a way that it cannot be removed, so the problem cannot be fixed by simply sending the correct bearing. This was a disappointing waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L.

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed with the Wellmax and returned it
customer_reviews.text: Works only on smooth surfaces. Flipped 3 times when I used it on the sidewalk. I believe it is because the front wheels are too small. Hit EVERY crack hard. Never had that problem with any other cart. I was very disappointed with the Wellmax and returned it. Poor quality wheels and design.
customer_reviews.author: Paddlinduck

customer_reviews.title: All in All a Great Cart
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it is to assemble, just the rear axle and two wheels. I find it to be very sturdy and just the right size for my needs. The basket is large enough to hold a lot of stuff. The wheels did well while pushing it along the sidewalk. I don't know if having slightly larger front swivel wheels would help with getting over uneven terrain. All in all a great cart
customer_reviews.author: Greg Moten

customer_reviews.title: Finally spent $50 on this wonderful cart, instead of the previous ones for half ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally spent $50 on this wonderful cart, instead of the previous ones for half its price. But it is well worth it. Very well made and the wheels are ridiculously easy to put on. Hope this one will last longer than the $25 ones. Over one year later... it is still a wonderful cart, still love it, still sturdy, still very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handles 50lbs of groceries with ease!
customer_reviews.text: By far, the best investment I made when shopping for my parents. Such a huge help bringing groceries up from the car to their condo all in one trip! Folds away easily, very dependable and doesn't have those cheap plastic wheels you hear get damaged all the time. Well built and literally takes a minute to put together out of the box, all you do is slide the rods through and click the wheels on... and BAM, you're done! I think I might just buy another one as a gift, this is a total lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: AkAsh1NY

customer_reviews.title: It's a keeper
customer_reviews.text: The cart just arrived tonight so I haven't even taken it out of doors yet. The back wheels went on in about two heartbeats and the swiveling front wheels are a delight. It is slightly larger than my former granny cart but that's OK. As of this moment, I am so pleased with it that I know I will never store it outside my apartment door, as I did with the cart that 'died.' It will stay safe and clean in my kitchen when it is not accompanying me through Trader Joe's. One of the best things about this product is that it is shipped from a company in California with an actual in-state phone number. How novel.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: This cart came in so handy during and after our move!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this cart because we were preparing to move from a house to an apartment. We would be bringing groceries up in an elevator and thought this would be handy. But we found out it made the moving days much, much easier! We used a dolly and this cart for everything we moved! It helped with boxes, clothes on hangers, bags of food, EVERYTHING! Now we are using it for the intended purpose, and it is wonderful! It's very sturdy and I think it will last years. Thanks for such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: B. J. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service -- replaced entire cart!
customer_reviews.text: I just want to say thank you for the great customer service. As reported by other customers, one of the wheels on my cart broke. I contacted the seller and they replaced the ENTIRE cart, with no charge at all (not even shipping). The cart worked beautifully, even on the bricks of Alexandria, VA - I'm not sure what happened with the front wheel to snap it off. What I'd recommend (and plan to do in the future) is to pull the full cart tipped down so it is rolling only on the larger wheels. I think that will prevent problems in the future.
customer_reviews.author: R.Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Worth spending the money
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy grocery cart! I wasn't looking to spend $50 on a grocery cart, but after reading the reviews for the ones that were $15 and $20 cheapre I realized they probably wouldn't be very reliable or last very long. This one is very sturdy and was made very well. Overall, I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGirl

customer_reviews.title: Life changer! 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about a month and it's a life changer. I walk everywhere. There's only so much I can carry in a backpack. I've put it to the weight test when I went to get 2 bags of 25 pounds of cat litter. The swivel wheels make a huge difference. **The liner I bought separately**
customer_reviews.author: Jamie spore

customer_reviews.title: Its good. Was convenient to carry a case of water ...
customer_reviews.text: Its good. Was convenient to carry a case of water from Costco and few other things. Not the strongest of products. So far its okay and really helpful for us as we live in the 2nd floor. Will post some pics later.
customer_reviews.author: Nirmal Mukundan

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Not fit for its purpose. It's fine if you intend to use it on perfectly flat ground but if there are uneven spots be prepared to have your cart topple over and everything fall out. The front wheels as mentioned in previous reviews are too small. Certainly not suitable for a senior who wants to use it for shopping, just in case someone is looking for that purpose. Look elsewhere. We regret buying it but my husband can't be bothered returning it, he will probably never use it again after the fiasco of our recent shopping trip in Chicago.
customer_reviews.author: Bonzilass

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Maneuverable
customer_reviews.text: I like how sturdy this cart is, and the swivel wheels make it much easier to maneuver than the last cart I had. I wish it was a little larger, but otherwise, this is a terrific little cart for hauling groceries (via the elevator and a long hallway) to my second-floor apartment.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Not as lightweight as suggested in the assembly video
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift for an elderly person. I'm concerned after simply removing the item from the outer packaging that is a kind of heavy, so they won't be able to lift it and put in in their car whereas in the assembly video the guy says it is "extremely" lightweight. Futhermore, there are quite a few reviews suggesting that the wheels are problematic, that they come off easily or halt forward movement abruptly, but you see hundreds of videos about how great it is and it makes you wonder how many reviews are false reviews placed by someone working for the company that makes these.
customer_reviews.author: I Liketh Reading

customer_reviews.title: Best Cart Made
customer_reviews.text: This cart has solved all my cartage needs! From the padded handle, which is marvelous for older, arthritic hands to the front swivel wheels that make for effortless steerage! From the sturdy basket that can hold eight 12-packs of soda to the very affordable price! I’ve had other carts, and I’ve used some friends’ more expensive carts, and none are comparable to this one. I am going to buy a removable liner for it to make it even more versatile. I highly recommend this cart to everyone, you will not be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Trish Krogh

customer_reviews.title: Best shopping cart ever!
customer_reviews.text: I do not have one bad thing to say about this product. Overnight, it made my life a LOT easier. I live in an apt, and from the car to my front door is a solid five minute commute. When you are carrying loads of grocery bags in each hand, and dislocating both shoulders, it feels like 5 miles. I LOVE THIS THING! Super easy to assemble. The only thing to do is insert the axle and attach both rear wheels. Very easy to maneuver, and it came with a liner! WORTH EVERY PENNY!
customer_reviews.author: Rabid Reader

customer_reviews.title: I do stack cases of water/Gatorade on top and that has worked fine. Biggest improvement I wish is the wheels would ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a recent lingering injury that has made things harder for me to carry and move around. This is used for my groceries because I live in an apartment. Seems to hold a decent amount but seems a little flimsy. Would not advise to add more than 30-40 lbs. because I am afraid the bottom may break open. I do stack cases of water/Gatorade on top and that has worked fine. Biggest improvement I wish is the wheels would be easier to move over things on the ground easier, the wheels get caught when the car is heavy. Great for groceries, lighter items.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight cart
customer_reviews.text: I have a back injury which makes getting around difficult, so I began having my groceries delivered. I have them load my cart outside my house on my porch so I can bring them in by myself. The cart is big enough to load most of my grocery items for one trip inside yet small enough to maneuver around a small house. When I am finished with the cart it is so easy to fold away and hang on my wall in the garage. Highly recommend for seniors or someone with limited mobility.
customer_reviews.author: ellen

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room but does not tolerate anything too heavy to push with those swivel wheels.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for first time from my car to the house via my handicapped ramp. Was bringing some groceries but seems to bog down in the front then won’t push or guide. I thought the turning front wheels would be good. Only works well as long as you don’t put any heavy grocery items in it. When it bogs down I have to turn it around and pull it behind me. The size is wonderful so you can carry more but the front wheels don’t like more groceries. Especially if it starts to get heavy. That’s why I got the cart cause I can’t carry heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Augusta Porter

customer_reviews.title: This cart sure makes life easier!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best backsaver when you live in an apartment! It folds flat so you can carry it in your car, and when you get home, fill it up with whatever you bought. It rolls easily and you can push or pull it up steps and down long corridors. My diet coke habit was really difficult to carry but now I can put up to four 12 packs on end and roll them in! My daughter was making fun of me buying 'an old lady cart' and now she wants her own! I highly recommend this cart!
customer_reviews.author: L. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Makes City Living Easier!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to assemble and great quality!! Perfect size for shopping in the city and very easy to maneuver on the sidewalk. I love that it takes up minimal storage space, just fold up and store it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Debrd05

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Simple
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Wellmax shopping cart to help my mom get groceries from her car to her condo without making several trips. The cart is sturdy and well-made, but only weighs about 8 lbs - light enough that my 80+ yo mom can easily lift it into and out of her car trunk when needed. The only assembly needed was to insert the long pin so the large rear wheels could be snapped into place. Took all of 1 minute. The cart folds down nearly flat (about 3-4" in depth) as well. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ligos

customer_reviews.title: Good but with a flaw
customer_reviews.text: Overall this cart is well made and works well but it has a significant flaw. The side rails that go from the front to the back of the cart fall out. They are not properly attached to the vertical rails at the four corners. I have now put epoxy on them where they attach and so far they have stayed in but that was after several of the side rails had fallen out without me realizing they were gone and those are lost. The manufacturer needs to figure out a way to better attach the side rails so they will stay attached.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: An excellent cart and with the price!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research reading reviews and comments and watching user videos and decided to buy this cart: IT IS EXCELLENT! It’s sturdy yet easy to fold and maneuver. The basket is big and is perfect for transporting groceries, and a variety of other uses. And no tools were needed; simply snap on the two rear wheels on the axel and you’re set to go. BUY IT.
customer_reviews.author: What'sTalkin'About

customer_reviews.title: Wellmax Shopping Cart
customer_reviews.text: The cart is well made and easy to put together. When folded, takes little space for storage. I think this would be great for someone who's entrance is on the ground floor. It's very convenient to put groceries in, has quite a bit of space. The reason I gave it four stars is that I found it very difficult to bring it down my apartment steps (7 steps) when it is fully loaded. I felt like it was going to pull me down with it.
customer_reviews.author: NYLADY

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: This cart was purchased for my high school majorettes and colorguard to use for their equipment. The ease of assembly was comical. I put it off for 3 days, dreading the task. The joke was on me, so easy and no tools. Can’t wait for the squad to use it. Update: This is easily packed in the equipment van and rolls with ease to and from the fields. All the flags, batons, and other props are fitting and kept together. This is amazing !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Engle

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use.
customer_reviews.text: Back wheel broke on first trip from the grocery store. The back wheels are made of plastic and the metal rod that goes in is not secure enough to last. I was walking home on the sidewalk, not perfectly smooth but not full of holes either.. just uneven here and there. Back wheel broke.. plastic ring in the wheel chipped off so I couldn't reattach. I had to remove the back wheels and struggle home using the front wheels. This is a nice cart but if you're not on the smoothest of sidewalks dont buy.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome car!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cart! I've used it from toting groceries into the house, toting laundry and taking stuff to work. I have a sterlite 1.5 square laundry basket that fits perfectly on top. Makes doing laundry super easy. I also got a surprise when I unboxed my cart. There was a basket liner in it too! Assembly couldn't have been easier. Insert one rod for the back wheels and snap them in! Two minutes and I was wheeling away! I just purchased new garbage bags to fit inside to tackle cleaning out the garage or really anything else. Just in time for spring cleaning and tackling the annual cleaning out the closets!
customer_reviews.author: Bella :-)

customer_reviews.title: Mother's Helper
customer_reviews.text: I received my cart promptly and put it together easily this morning. It's sturdy and moves easily. I am looking forward to using it to transfer heavy grocery bags from the back of the car to the kitchen to make it easier to move and store the groceries I bought at the store. Since writing the previous review I have used the utility cart to transport three heavy grocery bags from the garage into the kitchen with a minimum of effort. It was a big improvement over the bag-by-bag chore that I had been using. I'm very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Gal

customer_reviews.title: So far, So Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: While I don't use my cart over rough terrain or have to walk distances with it, I am finding it very handy and easy to use. I am close to 80 yo and find lugging heavy grocery bags into my home a real and painful challenge. I just load them into my new Wellmax cart, up 2 steps in into my house! It moves very easily, pops open and closes easily. Wish I had this a long time ago. I move everything around in it! And I did put it together myself. No brainer!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Habbick

customer_reviews.title: Met all expectations
customer_reviews.text: This product met all of my expectations. I took time to research many different cart models and chose this one based on buyer comments. It was easy to put together and is easy to fold. Additionally it folds flat, comes with a nice insert to prevent items from falling through the bottom, and maneuvers well. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey B. Kortick

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good - kind of light weight though
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for my uses. Use it for a catch-all used clothes hamper in the bedroom then wheel it the larger hampers for sorting when necessary. The front wheels make some maneuvering difficult or worse, as they are too small in my opinion. If one leans of the handle or puts to much weight there, it tips over, front wheels in the air and contents sort of half in, half out, depending on what's in there. Over all good for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble-assemble is too strong-it’s only unwrapping and snapping on 2 wheels and a cross bar. Took all of 3 minutes. Good size, sturdy, rolls easily, just what I wanted. I wish it was just a couple of inches taller, so that when I tilted it back to roll it on the larger wheels, the handle hit higher on my hand, I feel like I’m using fingers to pull it instead of a more solid grip if it hit my palm, but overall I’m very pleased. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Back big wheel came off on 1st use.
customer_reviews.text: The back big wheel came off on the 1st use in the middle of a pedestrian crossing with raging motorists unhappy that I was stranded with a full cart too heavy to reinsert the wheel on the spot. A good Samaritan rescued me by carrying the whole cart & load off the street & put the fallen wheel back on for me. Returning this cart after seeing how easily the back wheels come off. Went & bought another cart at my local grocery store for $19.99 which is btw bigger with wheels that are secured with hardware securely. Sorry, but the back wheel design needs improvement.
customer_reviews.author: vettehayden

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to maneuver on urban streets
customer_reviews.text: Not ideal for urban streets. The wheels get stuck in cracks very easily. In addition, the handle bar is sized for someone who is between 5’2” -5’7” and It is way too short for somebody who is 5’7”or taller. It’s positioned in a way Puts a strain on the lower back
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this basket to have outside our door when grocery deliveries came. We leave a note that the person delivering can wheel the basket to their car to load up. Then when they have put our groceries in the basket, it's easy for us to wheel this well made cart inside the house and put away our food. It easily folds for storage until the next time. (My husband bought S hooks for the outside of the cart to hang more bags of groceries as needed. That was an excellent addition.) We are enjoying our little wheeled basket. It has exceeded our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier cart than other in this category but still a bit hard to navigate through uneven surfaces.
customer_reviews.text: It is a good cart but it is listed as being able to handle 60lb and I find that when it is fully loaded (with much less than 60lb) it is not easy to push (with the front small wheels in front) when the surface is slightly uneven like walking into an elevator. And when the cart is fully loaded lifting the front wheels to overcome an obstacle is difficult. The only way to overcome it is instead of pushing the cart drag it but then the steering is hard. I think the problem is with the front wheels. But otherwise well designed and sturdier than the previous version I purchased and broke after a short time.
customer_reviews.author: Losik

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I love this little cart. I use it for all kinds of things. I live in an apartment so I load it up and wheel it to the car with all the items I need for my errands. It is light and easy to pick up and load in the car trunk. Having said that, if you are pushing the cart and there is an uneven place on the road I often stumble because the forward motion of your body wants to continue when the pavement has gaps. I have just learned to pull it over those areas instead of pushing. I recommend this cart but recommend you review the path you will be using it on.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in February as I had moved and my complex apartment was across the street from the building. I used it a lot to carry in groceries and other items. Today, as I was rolling it with groceries, 2 of the rungs on the side popped out of the holes and fell off. The rungs at the bottom are kind of bending as well. I only buy groceries for 2 people and it’s not a ton as it all fits in the cart in one trip. Disappointed that it has barely lasted 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Love this cart!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is exactly what I wanted. It’s a good size for putting in my car, collapses easily and compactly, and carries loads I would have trouble with. I recently moved into an apartment and quickly found that I needed something to help me get my groceries (and probably other things) from mt car to the elevators and then to my apartment. Several people have asked me where I got it because it is more compact than the ones they’ve looked at. I’ve also used it to retrieve packages from the front desk .
customer_reviews.author: DC Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose rolling basket.
customer_reviews.text: This mulitipurpose basket cart is well built and sturdy, with swivel front wheels to allow safe, easy turns from all directions. It folds up neatly and securely for storage and transport. Whether it purchased for use in shopping, laundry, gardening, or other uses, this cart will provide activity independence and convenience, for seniors, those with limited mobility, or anyone else looking for a multipurpose cart for use at home, work or outings. I highly recommend this product and the seller- who does personal follow ups with buyers to ensure total satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Classic country girl

customer_reviews.title: Goes up and down stairs easily.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cart mostly to help me taking my laundry up and down the stairs as my laundry is in the basement. It goes up and down the stairs easily and helps immensely with that job. Today I loaded this with a huge order from Costco to take down stairs to my freezer and it worked perfect for that task also.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine A. Conway

customer_reviews.title: light-weight and sturdy  - easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: light weight and sturdy - front swivel wheels make it easier to maneuver- i bought this one because my large one was getting too heavy for me as i have aged and become disabled. this is a medium size, light in weight and well constructed. i was especially drawn to it because you just snap the wheels on - no tools and bending pins to attach the wheels which is a negative if you have issues with your hands or fingers. wheels can be easily removed if needed
customer_reviews.author: hlc

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold up well on city streets. Gets caught on the slightest bump on sidewalks. Based on previous reviews I thought this would be fine, but I find myself stopping whenever there is a slight bump. Today it stopped on a completely flat surface, and I almost tripped over it. I regret purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: This cart is a godsend
customer_reviews.text: I have neuropathy (nerve damage) and cannot carry much weight at all without being in pain. Taking groceries from my car to the house was such a chore (painful and time consuming) that I ended up paying someone to do my shopping and bring the groceries into my kitchen. This cart fits nicely in my truck along with the groceries. So I can now bring all the groceries to the house in one trip. So, no more pain and I'm saving the delivery money I used to spend.
customer_reviews.author: Ann S.

customer_reviews.title: I expected better quality
customer_reviews.text: The cart is fully adequate and will likely be fine to cart mostly groceries. However, I expected the materials to be better made given it is one of the mre expensive carts of this type. For example, the axle was rusty so will very likely get much worse as the cart is used. This clearly indicates poor quality control. It's made in China so maybe that's what should be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jake S.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!! Dangerous item - will break
customer_reviews.text: We used this cart only twice - but on the second use, the cart broke, my partner fell face down to the floor and hurt both his legs. We only had bags of laundry - 3 bags of medium weight, nothing crazy. The pavement was uneven, the cart collapsed, and the handle broke in half as shown on the picture. Had my partner fallen onto the broken bars, they would’ve punctured him! Clearly this item is poorly designed and cannot hold a small weight in an uneven pavement. For this price, I was expecting a sturdy cart. Do not buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Calliope

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy cart, easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: I researched several carts similar to this one before purchasing this one. It was extremely easy to install the large wheels, everything else was already assembled. It's a very sturdy cart and maneuvered easily when I tested it out. The foam handle cover makes it easy to grip. I bought this as a gift for my elderly mother, but she had purchased one on her own before I was able to give it to her so I did return it. I would definitely recommend this cart, and will purchase the same one again if needed in the future.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mc

customer_reviews.title: Strong Grocery Cart, Four Wheels, Great for Older Shoppers
customer_reviews.text: I use this cart for transporting groceries home on the bus from the grocery store or Costco. It is strong, has four wheels and easily folds. I cannot live without one, and I think this one is the best around. No shortcuts made on this cart. Even foam on the handle which is comfortable on my arthritic hands. This cart is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kat LeonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had ordered this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Originally I ordered this to help bring in groceries from the car to the house. Actually, I use it more often in moving clothes back and forth to the laundry room. My mesh laundry bags fit perfectly. I might not need the liner I bought, too, but I like having it so my mesh laundry bag wouldn’t catch on anything. I use a cane, and moving taundry was hard for me, but now it’s easy. I love the way the front wheels swivel. It was easy for my husband to assemble. I think all he had to do was put the wheels on. It was ready so fast I’m not sure what he did.
customer_reviews.author: shirl111

customer_reviews.title: Not a good cart for bumps in the hallway (or elevator)
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this cart. Wish I had not purchased. The wheels are different sizes (front/back)--front ones are tinier than back ones. So, the cart does not GO OVER any bumps very well--I mean simple things like trim pieces for carpet in hallways, elevator "bumps" when you are exiting, even doorway trim pieces. You literally have to "lift" the cart up a little bit to get over obstacles, or just SHOVE IT really hard (which could break it eventually). The wheels are not good even though the front ones swivel--WHO designs a cart with different size wheels? I am so disappointed here.
customer_reviews.author: G. Vanpelt

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: It was so easy to slip the wheels on and put to work. First job was 40 lbs of dog food rolled out of my office to my truck then home, up my ramp and into the house. Worked like a dream. Now that I've used it several times I'm more in love with my cart. I keep it in the garage for grocery loads that I can roll up my wheelchair ramp and into the kitchen. Then I bring it in on laundry day to haul the loads up and down the hall. I never thought I would be this disabled at 61 and I'm all about making life easier for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Paper SlaveTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece that has to walk pretty far to a grocery store. She had been struggling carry sacks and even thought shes very strong, she could never really get more than two days for her and her husband. I had this sent to her ad she loves, only a couple of times week now. She said it was easy to set up and easy to fold away, plus very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: yet sturdy. Secure wheels
customer_reviews.text: Works out perfectly for carting my Mom's laundry and supplies back and forth between home and her Assisted Living facility, so much so that I purchased 2 -- one for me and one for my sister. Has saved me so much time and effort, making chores and deliveries that much easier! Lightweight, yet sturdy. Secure wheels. Easy to fold up and put into the back of my car. Purchased the liner too for a bit more privacy in carting supplies back and forth. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Donna W

customer_reviews.title: Designers need common sense
customer_reviews.text: If a woman were to design this she would: make space behind cart for walking legs by extending the handle...so she doesn’t nearly fall 5 times with 1 trip! Make the front wheels bigger so it doesn’t get stuck in the NYC cracks AND she doesn’t nearly fall 5 times with 1 trip!!! Horrible!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous buyer

customer_reviews.title: why did I wait so long.....
customer_reviews.text: Great Cart!! I don't know why I waited so long. Just received it a week ago. I am retired and take public transportation. I have used it twice since getting it. Once to the laundry mat and the other to the grocery store. With the 7" back wheels it makes the cart an easy on & off the bus. Capacity is ample. I packed a comforter, comforter cover, towels, detergent, and fabric softener with no problem. Either pulling or packing onto cart. The cart is very well made. It is of a better quality I have found in hardware stores. I would recommend to any one who enjoys walking and pulling their load with.
customer_reviews.author: moon

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy, will work well for transporting my groceries from my carport to my apartment. I have a rolling carry all, but it did not have a basket and I could not bring in my grocery bags without them falling off. I also have to come up a flight of stairs so this will help me. Nice, sturdy, easy to assemble, moves easily, lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Compared to the few others . . .
customer_reviews.text: I found Wellmax cart sturdy to hold under 60 lbs. The design of the wheels seem reliable, not likely to fail, come off, or break as easily as other carts I've read about. I have yet to use it but tested it out. By merely rolling it, opening and closing it, giving it an easy twirl or two, I trust it will serve me well for my apartment living doing laundry or using for groceries. And it stores easily upright taking up little space. The handle height, width, and padding serve well unlike other more narrow ones or those that require torquing the wrists a bit.
customer_reviews.author: nbeacon

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, no replacement parts available
customer_reviews.text: We loved the cart until the wheel broke after a month and made it useless. I contacted the company hoping to purchase a new wheel but was told they do not sell them, so once the cheap wheel breaks, the cart cannot be fixed. I've looked for a few wheel replacements but have been unable to find any. Would not purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably great in more ways than one!
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever write reviews but I had to this time. I am recovering from a broken hip and leg and bought this to help me with transporting groceries, etc. It was exceedingly easy to put together. Took me all of one minute and I am a 65 year old girl! Not only is it serving me well with shopping, but as an added bonus, I am using it as an amazing substitute for my unwieldy walker! It maneuvers so easily. I just love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey B. Hall

customer_reviews.title: A GROCERY CART THAT SATISFIES!
customer_reviews.text: I love the little cart! It holds 66 lb. which is plenty for me, compared to the previous one, which held 200 and was too big for my apt. It also seems well-made and is much more maneuverable than the larger one. It does stick occasionally on a crack ot rut but that is the nature of the 360 degree swivel of the front wheels. You can either tip it back raising the front feet or pull it from the front. Also, I have only one usable hand and I can operate it smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: S. S. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Sorry I did not get this sooner
customer_reviews.text: This cart has made grocery shopping less dreaded. It is so easy to unload the car now. It stays in the garage ready to go to work. Really great when unloading heavy liquids such as soft drinks, wine or even large detergent bottles. Makes short work of the chore. I think it would be perfect for apt. dwellers or students having to park a distance from their living space.
customer_reviews.author: LWM

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool for Elderly Mom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cart for my 87-year old mom to aid her in bringing groceries and packages into the house form her van. She has a hard time walking and cannot lift heavy objects so this cart was a god send!!! Wish I had thought of it sooner. It was easy to assemble and is lightweight for her to lift into and out of the car. She is thrilled with its ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: A real winner!
customer_reviews.text: This is a winner! Excellent quality. It folds easily and can be hung on a hook or tucked into a closet. Opens with one hand, holds much more than we'd expected, and is very sturdy. One tip - the large wheels in the back of the cart roll a bit more easily over uneven surfaces than do the smaller front wheels, so if entering elevators or going over a bumpy area, we've found that it's better to pull the cart rather than push it so that the large rear wheels are leading.
customer_reviews.author: Cape Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This cart was surprisingly much better quality than I expected. All you have to do to assemble it is pop on the wheels. It folds and unfolds just by lifting up the front. I expect it to last a very long time and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: The handle is short and makes it harder to push.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s good. I have to give 3 stars because I feel the handle part is a little short for me, I wish it was longer. I am 5’7’’ and it’s a little hard for me to keep pushing the cart. My husband is 6’1’’ so it’s harder. I don’t recommend this cart if you’re similar hight as us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great improvement over my previous cart. The front wheels are on a separate axial so it turns like an automobile, no more dragging or jerking it to get it to change directions. It is heaver than my previous cart so I chose a smaller size so when I fold it and lift it into the car it won't be as difficult to lift. If I didn't need to lift it I would have gotten a slightly larger one but this usually holds all the items from a shopping trip. It came with a lightweight liner which I was not expecting but is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Dog

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love this cart for carrying groceries into my home. So easy to assemble. I am 78 years old and I spent perhaps two inutes putting on the rear wheels. That easy. Folds up quickly and hangs on the wall of my garage. I highly recommend this product. I wish I found it earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Dicks Chick

customer_reviews.title: Grocery Shuffle
customer_reviews.text: I live on the 9th floor so getting a lot of groceries upstairs was challenging. You never know what you are going to get on Amazon, but I always read the reviews. I think this is meant for short stints, not long hauls honestly, but for what I need it for (garage to condo) it is perfect. It folds up nicely in my trunk and is light weight. It also holds a crap ton of groceries (weight) if you put it in there strategically.
customer_reviews.author: Tenesha McCulloch

customer_reviews.title: Superior product
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I've ever bought. I use it to bring my laundry to the laundry room because I can't carry a basket. I love the padded grip handle, and how easily it rolls. Very easy to maneuver forwards, backwards, even over thresholds. It is light enough that I can easily push or pull it, and can fold it easily to put it away. I'm seriously thinking of getting another one for groceries!!
customer_reviews.author: Lthouselady

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my application.
customer_reviews.text: My new place is a very long walk from my assigned parking spot so I bought this to carry my things, such as groceries and luggage, to and from my car. It folds easily and holds a lot of stuff. It rolls easily and has been very helpful. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: North Texas Girl

customer_reviews.title: Best Shopping Cart
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase of Wellmax Shopping Cart. Well made and assembly was a snap, serious a snap, just snap on back big wheels (loving maneuverable front wheels too) and you are good to go. Thank you Wellmax for making this old lady's life a little bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Gale A. Garner

customer_reviews.title: Nice cart, wheels seem solid
customer_reviews.text: After my wife had knee surgery she used this cart to help her walk around after she was done with crutches. It helped her carry extra stuff and do basic shopping. Easy folding and fit right in the back seat of her small sedan. This cart made her recovery go much easier, she felt like she could still do the things she liked every day without the extra hassle of trying to walk or balance on a healing leg while carrying things.
customer_reviews.author: C.R.

customer_reviews.title: The shopping car fall forward
customer_reviews.text: in view that the front wheels are very small, they remain trapped in each relief of the sidewalks which causes the shopping car to go forward and fall forward, the bad thing is that whoever drives it falls with the shopping car due the weight of the bag, I had a spectacular fall and two attempts to fall
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Solorzano

customer_reviews.title: The front wheels break off
customer_reviews.text: The plastic holding the front wheels is weak. Both front wheels broke off, after not much use. Otherwise, yes it is quite solid, but a chain is only as strong as the weakest link. You might be ok if you never put too much load on the cart.
customer_reviews.author: no one

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality - BUT the handle is just way too short
customer_reviews.text: We have chosen to continue to use our old cart that has 2 front broken wheels instead. This cart was easy to assemble. I did it myself which is rare. I am 5"7' and the handle is just way too short for me. My husband and son are taller so they won't even consider it. In any town where you walk to do errands carts are used multiple times a week. This just doesn't work for our family BUT hopefully it will work for everyone else!
customer_reviews.author: HappyPrincess

customer_reviews.title: handy little thing
customer_reviews.text: perfect for bringing home the bacon. And the gallon of milk, and the OJ... I got the matching liner, which is useful, and has a cover too. I love that this cart can be pushed , it has little swivel wheels in front, so I dont have to pull it behind me on 2 wheels - unless I want to. the only thing missing is those little hooks that allow you to hang it on a supermarket cart, so I attached two carabiners .
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Li

customer_reviews.title: Great price and extremely durable!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and durable!>} You will learn how to stack heavy items at the bottom to lighter at the top. I have also hung a plant I purchased on it. It’s holds a lot!! I would not recommend this for big “family” shops. Perfect for 1-2 people!! It puts together in under a minute. Fits perfectly in the trunk. Extra black insert dose come in handy if you are not using bags for smaller items not to fall thru the squares. Sturdy! Don’t be fooled by cheaper baskets.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: It's fine
customer_reviews.text: It's fine if you live somewhere with pristine sidewalks. I like the swivel wheels but have to push it on tilted on the back wheels because it catches onto any imperfection. I almost fell over it several times after being caught on uneven ground. If it had been my mother, she would have seriously injured herself. Additionally I've had larger, sturdier shopping carts from the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Shaks

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: So far, I am happy with this cart. I live in an apartment building with key fob entry and I needed something to make unloading my Costco purchases. I think this does a good job! It is simple to put together and use. It is also good quality. I have used to lug heavier stuff in such as shelving that I have yet to assemble. The only issue with the cart is that it could roll smoother over surfaces that weren't completely level. I have hard time getting it to roll in and out of the elevator, for instance. Other than that, no issues!
customer_reviews.author: imonedaful

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for anyone who needs a little extra help bringing groceries in.  We love it!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby and I are in our 70s and he is finding it hard to get "older" He laughed when this was delivered but the very next day we came home with grocery bags that were packed much too heavy for us to carry. First thing he said, "go get that cart you bought." Imagine me laughing when he loaded the cart and easily pushed it on the sidewalk, up two steps and into our condo. This was a life saver for both of us. He is not laughing now!
customer_reviews.author: Dotty Marie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful household addition.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact I can load all my trunk contents into this great cart, roll it into the house and it folds and stores so easily. Should have bought it years ago. Now only one trip from the garage to house. And when it folds up, my husband put hooks on the garage wall to store it. Will easily get over a few steps as one set of wheels swivel.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: Roomy & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This sturdy cart beats my old canvas one by a long shot. This is a great cart, big wheels that don't collapse. I bought $200 in groceries and only had to make 2 trips in with this baby! It is collapsible and easy to store. I recommend this cart.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Davis

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a liner
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize it, but this product comes with a liner. I wish I'd known, as I bought a liner separately & I now have to return it. Overall, I'm very satisfied with the product, though. Easy to maneuver & folds up nicely. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Very useful cart
customer_reviews.text: The cart is sturdy and easy to roll with the swivel front wheels. We use it to bring groceries in from garage to kitchen and it holds a good bit. We also have to take our garbage to a county convenience center so we wheel 13 gallon kitchen garbage bags full from kitchen to car. Very helpful to us 80 year olds!
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: It works great. I overloaded it quite a bit and it made it to my door very carefully. I had three 30lb bags of cat litter, a 24 pack of canned soda, a 12 pack of monsters, 2 jugs of creamer, and a few small light items, and it made it. I probably won't do that every time, but it was good to see it could handle it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and read a lot of reviews before I purchase almost any thing and this is a very good product. It's easy to assemble and well made. I am very happy with this choice and you will be too!
customer_reviews.author: OhLiz

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and serves purpose well
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my parents to get their groceries from the car to the house with much more ease and they love it! At first, they weren't very excited but it seems every time we talk, I hear of yet another use they've found for using it and that it's made their life so much easier. The big back wheels make it through the snowy driveway/walkway with no problem, too!
customer_reviews.author: PrairieGirl

customer_reviews.title: Easily folds up to a minimum configuration
customer_reviews.text: I have had the cart about a month. Easily folds up to a minimum configuration, lightweight, very controllable. The rear wheels are suspect to wear out and/or pop off depending on the load being put upon the cart and the ruggedness of the terrain. I had one wheel come loose while transporting a heavy load. I tapped it back onto the axle with my foot. While not borrowing trouble from the future, this cart is very good and is the first one I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: ronbo

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, sturdy construction and a great help with everyday chores.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this cart. It is just what we needed to make a sometimes tedious job, much easier. Simple and easy assembly. Cart is light, but has shown to be sturdy. I'm pleased at how much I can transport in one trip. We do use this cart often, but because we wish it to last, we use caution to stay within the weight limits. We do not abuse it. We recommend this cart. I think you will happy with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S.Kay

customer_reviews.title: Greatest invention since sliced bread! :)
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine little cart, handy and convenient, makes hauling groceries and other items from the car to our apartment...or bagged trash and recyclables from apartment to dumpster so easy. Makes me wonder why we didn’t get one long before now. This unit is the perfect size, well-made, sturdy but lightweight, casters move it along smoothly with ease.
customer_reviews.author: BrendaB

customer_reviews.title: Handy Grocery Cart
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this for me to get groceries out of car after my third back surgery. This cart is such a great helper! Only complaint is you have to pull cart over uneven sidewalk. Cannot push it ahead of you as wheels get caught in each crack. I think all wheels should be the bigger size but it does hold quite a bit of groceries!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Rayner

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart and have used it several time already. It's a long walk from my parking space to the front door, so this cart is great for bringing groceries into the house. Also use it to take trash to the dumpster. Saves a lot of steps. Good quality and easy to store when not in use. I would recommend this cart.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

product_meta.title: Wellmax WM99024S Grocery Utility Shopping Cart, Easily Collapsible and Portable to Save Space and Heavy Duty, Light Weight Trolley with Rolling Swivel Wheels
product_meta.description: The newly released Wellmax Grocery Shopping Cart has been outfitted head-to-toe for versatility, easy maneuverability, maximum capacity and comfort. Everything from the padded handle to the 360 degree swivel wheels, this cart accommodates a variety of items in many shapes and sizes, up to 66 lbs. Built using premium metal materials, rest assured this grocery cart will get your items to where they need to be, safe and sound.
feature_bullets: COMPACT & LIGHTWEIGHT - No assembly required, this foldable shopping cart is the perfect size for any household. Lightweight yet sturdy, the Wellmax shopping cart can fit oodles of items, up to 66 lbs. Better yet, this cart is engineered to fold flat so it won’t take up valuable room your house or apartment. Functional and efficient design are two of our main priorities at Wellmax!

DURABLY BUILT - There’s nothing worse than investing in a poorly made product. We are committed to engineering a cart that can sustain long-term, frequent use. Climbing the stairs? No problem. Trekking over a bumpy sidewalk? Have no fear. Using premium metal materials, this cart has been carefully crafted to withstand even the toughest wear and tear. This is your go-to shopping cart, wherever your destination may be.

OPTIMAL MANEUVERABILITY - Our newest model yet, this Wellmax shopping cart can truly go wherever you go. Uniquely designed for easy maneuverability, this cart can change directions smoothly thanks to 360 degree, 3” swivel wheels in the front and 7” snap on wheels in the back. Simply snap the back wheels on or off for quick use and storage, and voila! Say goodbye to your cumbersome, clunky shopping carts.

VERSATILE USES - The Wellmax shopping cart can carry just about anything. Our customers love using it to transport anything from laundry and groceries, to camping gear and gardening tools! The possibilities are endless. With a large basket volume, this cart can accommodate an assortment of objects in varying shapes and sizes. Other notable uses include storage for sports equipment, beach gear and kitchen supplies.

FOR ALL YOU NEEDS: This lightweight and sturdy folding utility cart isn’t just for shopping in groceries stores. Our heavy duty shopping cart makes for a more practical and efficient alternative to laundry baskets, grocery carts, tool storage and so much more to save you time, effect and energy for a more convenient life.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,696 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
